tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE hiking_trails (
  trail_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trail_name VARCHAR(255),
  difficulty_level VARCHAR(50),
  trail_length_km FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE hiking_trails (
  trail_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trail_name VARCHAR(255),
  difficulty_level VARCHAR(50),
  trail_length FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE trail_difficulty (
  difficulty_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  difficulty_level VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE trail_length (
  length_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trail_id INT,
  trail_length FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE trails (
    trail_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trail_name TEXT,
    difficulty_level INT,
    trail_length DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE trail_reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trail_id INT,
    reviewer_name TEXT,
    review_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE trail_ratings (
    rating_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trail_id INT,
    rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE trail_images (
    image_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trail_id INT,
    image_url TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE trail_reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trail_id INT NOT NULL,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    review_text TEXT,
    rating INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (trail_id) REFERENCES trails(trail_id)
);

CREATE TABLE trail_activity_mapping (
    trail_id INT NOT NULL,
    activity_id INT NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (trail_id, activity_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (trail_id) REFERENCES trails(trail_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (activity_id) REFERENCES trail_activities(activity_id)
);
